showcases.title: Grief Created From Memory With Editor Collab
showcases.description: TCD, a group consisting of popular Geometry Dash players, has created Grief using Editor Collab entirely from memory. Watch how they utilized real-time collaboration to create this level!

showcases.title: First Rated Level Using Editor Collab
showcases.description: Synergize, by Tricipital and 19 other creators, has become the first rated level in Geometry Dash that was created fully with Editor Collab. Watch what they were able to create with real-time collaboration!

cta.title: Ready to achieve similar results?
cta.description: Get Editor Collab and start creating with your friends today. Whether you're a player or a creator, our platform is designed to enhance your collaborative experience.
